mapper.insert: insert into PAYMENT( COMPANY_ID, PAYMENT_TYPE, AMOUNT, PAYMENT_DATE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PAYMENT_ID ) values ( #{COMPANY_ID}, #{PAYMENT_TYPE}, #{AMOUNT}, #{PAYMENT_DATE}, #{STATUS}, now(), now(), #{PAYMENT_ID} )
mapper.update: update PAYMENT set COMPANY_ID = #{COMPANY_ID}, PAYMENT_TYPE = #{PAYMENT_TYPE}, AMOUNT = #{AMOUNT}, PAYMENT_DATE = #{PAYMENT_DATE}, UPDATE_TIME = now(), STATUS = #{STATUS}, PAYMENT_ID = PAYMENT_ID where PAYMENT_ID = #{PAYMENT_ID}
mapper.select: select COMPANY_ID, PAYMENT_TYPE, AMOUNT, PAYMENT_DATE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PAYMENT_ID from PAYMENT where PAYMENT_ID = #{PAYMENT_ID}
